response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. My proposal is to offer this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value. I trust this price will make the acquisition both financially beneficial and timely for your needs. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
